description: Amazon Web Services Systems Manager calls this API operation when you edit OpsMetadata in Application Manager.

parameters.name: OpsMetadataArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the OpsMetadata Object to update.

parameters.name: MetadataToUpdate
parameters.description: Metadata to add to an OpsMetadata object. (string) --- (dict) --- Metadata to assign to an Application Manager application. Value (string) --- Metadata value to assign to an Application Manager application.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: Metadata value to assign to an Application Manager application.

parameters.name: KeysToDelete
parameters.description: The metadata keys to delete from the OpsMetadata object. (string) ---

nested_items.name: OpsMetadataArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the OpsMetadata Object that was updated.
